title: It's the first time you're meeting me. We're all at Newcomb playing ultimate frisbee. You see the frisbee rolling on the ground. What does Kevin yell out?
choice3: KICK THE SHIT OUT OF IT!!

title: We're having a classic horror movie night at either Kenji's mom's house. Back when Netflix had star ratings, what was the maximum amount of stars for a bad horror movie night.
Now we're at Josh's parents house playing mafia. All of a sudden you notice I'm missing. Where did I go?
This time we're at the second hawaii trip with me, Kevin, Kenji, Austin, Tony, and Colin. We all take decide to take Kalua shots (except Colin). What happens to Tony?
choice2: Throws it up after telling us he's never thrown up from alcohol before

title: Now We're headed to Big Bear. It's me and Josh with Tyler driving his jeep. On the way up the jeep breaks down. This turns into a like a 10 hour delay before we finally get there, but how far did we get up the mountain?

title: When it was me, Colin, Josh, Kevin, and Austin playing Yugioh one time, I was all ready to destroy Colin with my gadget cards with spell to increase their damage by double.
